name: Lolita Syndrome
description: Lolita Syndrome (ロリータ・シンドローム) is a Japanese adult computer game created by Katsumi Mochizuki and distributed by Enix. It was the winner of Enix's second bi-annual Game Hobby Program Contest. The game was released for the FM-7 and PC-8801 platforms on 31 October 1983.
